function.name: find_cmm

report.name: circ_count
report.heading: Circulation Status.Count of Circs
report.query: SELECT 'Closed Circulations', COUNT(id) FROM action_circulation_legacy WHERE xact_finish IS NOT NULL AND x_migrate UNION ALL SELECT 'Open Circulations', COUNT(id) FROM action_circulation_legacy WHERE xact_finish IS NULL AND x_migrate

report.name: circ_count_unmigrated
report.heading: Circulation Status.Count of Circs
report.query: SELECT 'No Matching User', COUNT(id) FROM action_circulation_legacy WHERE xact_finish IS NULL AND x_migrate = FALSE AND usr IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT 'No Matching Item', COUNT(id) FROM action_circulation_legacy WHERE xact_finish IS NULL AND x_migrate = FALSE AND target_copy IS NULL

report.name: circ_count
report.heading: Circulation Status.Count of Circs
report.query: SELECT 'Closed Circulations', COUNT(id) FROM action_circulation WHERE xact_finish IS NOT NULL UNION ALL SELECT 'Open Circulations', COUNT(id) FROM action_circulation WHERE xact_finish IS NULL

report.name: circ_by_orgunit
report.heading: Circulations Count.Migrated.Org Unit
report.query: SELECT COUNT(acirc.id), acirc.x_migrate::TEXT, aou.name FROM action_circulation_legacy acirc JOIN actor.org_unit aou ON aou.id = acirc.circ_lib WHERE acirc.xact_finish IS NULL GROUP BY 2, 3

report.name: circ_by_orgunit
report.heading: Circulations Count.Org Unit
report.query: SELECT COUNT(acirc.id), aou.name FROM action_circulation acirc JOIN actor.org_unit aou ON aou.id = acirc.circ_lib WHERE acirc.xact_finish IS NULL GROUP BY 2

report.name: circs_by_duration
report.report_title: Migrated Circulations by Duration, Fine and Max Fine
report.heading: Count of Circs.Duration.Fine.Max Fine.Migrated
report.query: SELECT COUNT(id), duration_rule, recurring_fine_rule, max_fine_rule, x_migrate::TEXT FROM action_circulation_legacy WHERE x_migrate = TRUE GROUP BY 2, 3, 4, 5

report.name: circs_by_duration
report.report_title: Circulations by Duration, Fine and Max Fine
report.heading: Count of Circs.Duration.Fine.Max Fine
report.query: SELECT COUNT(id), duration_rule, recurring_fine_rule, max_fine_rule FROM action_circulation GROUP BY 2, 3, 4 ORDER BY 2, 3, 4

report.name: circs_by_usrgroup
report.report_title: Circulations by Rules and Patron Group
report.heading: Count of Circs.Duration.Fine.Max Fine.User Group.Matchpoints
report.query: SELECT COUNT(acirc.id), acirc.duration_rule, acirc.recurring_fine_rule, acirc.max_fine_rule, pgt.name, x.buildrows FROM action_circulation_legacy acirc JOIN actor.usr au ON au.id = acirc.usr JOIN permission.grp_tree pgt ON pgt.id = au.profile JOIN (SELECT acirc.id, ARRAY_TO_STRING(find_cmm(acirc.id),',') AS buildrows FROM action_circulation_legacy acirc WHERE acirc.x_migrate = TRUE) x ON x.id = acirc.id WHERE acirc.x_migrate = TRUE GROUP BY 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 ORDER BY 2, 3, 4, 5, 6

report.name: circs_by_usrgroup
report.report_title: Circulations by Rules and Patron Group
report.heading: Count of Circs.Duration.Fine.Max Fine.User Group.Matchpoints
report.query: SELECT COUNT(acirc.id), acirc.duration_rule, acirc.recurring_fine_rule, acirc.max_fine_rule, pgt.name, x.buildrows FROM action_circulation acirc JOIN actor.usr au ON au.id = acirc.usr JOIN permission.grp_tree pgt ON pgt.id = au.profile JOIN (SELECT acirc.id, ARRAY_TO_STRING(find_cmm(acirc.id),',') AS buildrows FROM action_circulation acirc) x ON x.id = acirc.id GROUP BY 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 ORDER BY 2, 3, 4, 5, 6

report.name: circs_by_circmod
report.report_title: Circulations by Rules and Circulation Modifier
report.heading: Count of Circs.Duration.Fine.Max Fine.Circulation Modifier.Matchpoints
report.query: SELECT COUNT(acirc.id), acirc.duration_rule, acirc.recurring_fine_rule, acirc.max_fine_rule, ac.circ_modifier, x.buildrows FROM action_circulation_legacy acirc JOIN asset.copy ac ON ac.id = acirc.target_copy JOIN (SELECT acirc.id, ARRAY_TO_STRING(find_cmm(acirc.id),',') AS buildrows FROM action_circulation_legacy acirc WHERE acirc.x_migrate = TRUE) x ON x.id = acirc.id WHERE acirc.x_migrate = TRUE GROUP BY 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 ORDER BY 2, 3, 4, 5, 6

report.name: circs_by_circmod
report.report_title: Circulations by Rules and Circulation Modifier
report.heading: Count of Circs.Duration.Fine.Max Fine.Circulation Modifier.Matchpoints
report.query: SELECT COUNT(acirc.id), acirc.duration_rule, acirc.recurring_fine_rule, acirc.max_fine_rule, ac.circ_modifier, x.buildrows FROM action_circulation acirc JOIN asset.copy ac ON ac.id = acirc.target_copy JOIN (SELECT acirc.id, ARRAY_TO_STRING(find_cmm(acirc.id),',') AS buildrows FROM action_circulation acirc) x ON x.id = acirc.id GROUP BY 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 ORDER BY 2, 3, 4, 5, 6

report.name: circs_by_orgunit
report.report_title: Circulations by Rules and Org Unit
report.heading: Count of Circs.Duration.Fine.Max Fine.Library Branch
report.query: SELECT COUNT(acirc.id), acirc.duration_rule, acirc.recurring_fine_rule, acirc.max_fine_rule, aou.name FROM action_circulation_legacy acirc JOIN actor.org_unit aou ON aou.id = acirc.circ_lib WHERE acirc.x_migrate = TRUE GROUP BY 2, 3, 4, 5 ORDER BY 2, 3, 4, 5

report.name: circs_by_orgunit
report.report_title: Circulations by Rules and Org Unit
report.heading: Count of Circs.Duration.Fine.Max Fine.Library Branch
report.query: SELECT COUNT(acirc.id), acirc.duration_rule, acirc.recurring_fine_rule, acirc.max_fine_rule, aou.name FROM action_circulation acirc JOIN actor.org_unit aou ON aou.id = acirc.circ_lib GROUP BY 2, 3, 4, 5 ORDER BY 2, 3, 4, 5

report.name: non_cat_circs
report.heading: Circulations Count.Migrated
report.query: SELECT COUNT(id), x_migrate::TEXT FROM action_non_cataloged_circulation_legacy GROUP BY 2

report.name: non_cat_circs
report.heading: Circulations Count
report.query: SELECT COUNT(id) FROM action_non_cataloged_circulation

report.name: in_house
report.heading: In House Use Records.Migrated
report.query: SELECT COUNT(id), x_migrate::TEXT FROM action_in_house_use_legacy GROUP BY 2

report.name: in_house
report.heading: In House Use Records
report.query: SELECT COUNT(id) FROM action_in_house_use

report.name: circs_missing_rules
report.heading: Count.Field Missing
report.query: SELECT COUNT(id), 'Duration Rule Value' FROM action_circulation WHERE duration IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(id), 'Recurring Fine Rule Value' FROM action_circulation WHERE recurring_fine IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(id), 'Max Fine Rule Value' FROM action_circulation WHERE max_fine IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(id), 'Duration Rule' FROM action_circulation WHERE duration_rule IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(id), 'Recurring Fine Rule' FROM action_circulation WHERE recurring_fine_rule IS NULL UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(id), 'Max Fine Rule' FROM action_circulation WHERE max_fine_rule IS NULL

report.name: circ_open_by_item_status
report.report_title: Open Circulation and Status of Linked Items
report.heading: Count.Status
report.query: SELECT COUNT(acirc.id), ccs.name FROM action.circulation acirc JOIN asset.copy ac ON ac.id = acirc.target_copy JOIN config.copy_status ccs ON ccs.id = ac.status WHERE acirc.xact_finish IS NULL AND acirc.checkin_time IS NULL AND acirc.id IN (SELECT id FROM action_circulation) GROUP BY 2 ORDER BY 2

report.name: holds
report.heading: Hold Type.Hold Count.Migrated
report.query: SELECT 'Closed Holds', COUNT(id), x_migrate::TEXT FROM action_hold_request_legacy WHERE (expire_time::TIMESTAMP < now()) OR cancel_time IS NOT NULL OR fulfillment_time IS NOT NULL GROUP BY 3 UNION ALL SELECT 'Open Holds', COUNT(id), x_migrate::TEXT FROM action_hold_request_legacy WHERE (expire_time IS NULL OR expire_time::TIMESTAMP > now()) AND cancel_time IS NULL AND fulfillment_time IS NULL GROUP BY 3

report.name: holds_bytype
report.heading: Hold Type.Hold Count.Migrated
report.query: SELECT hold_type as "Hold Type", COUNT(id), x_migrate::TEXT FROM action_hold_request_legacy GROUP BY 1, 3

report.name: transit_open_by_item_status
report.report_title: Transit Copy Records and Status of Linked Items
report.heading: Count.Status
report.query: SELECT COUNT(atc.id), ccs.name FROM action.transit_copy atc JOIN asset.copy ac ON ac.id = atc.target_copy JOIN config.copy_status ccs ON ccs.id = ac.status WHERE atc.id IN (SELECT id FROM action_transit_copy) AND atc.dest_recv_time IS NULL GROUP BY 2 ORDER BY 2

report.name: transit_copies_by_status
report.report_title: Status of Items with Count of Open In Transits
report.heading: Count.Status.Count of Open Transits
report.query: SELECT COUNT(ac.id), ccs.name, SUM(CASE WHEN atc.id IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) FROM asset.copy ac JOIN config.copy_status ccs ON ccs.id = ac.status LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM action.transit_copy WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM action_transit_copy) AND dest_recv_time IS NULL) atc ON atc.target_copy = ac.id WHERE ac.id IN (SELECT id from asset_copy) GROUP BY 2 ORDER BY 2

report.name: hold_copies_by_status
report.report_title: Captured Holds with Status of Items
report.heading: Count of Captured Hold.Status of Item
report.query: SELECT COUNT(ahr.id), ccs.name FROM action.hold_request ahr JOIN asset.copy ac ON ac.id = ahr.current_copy JOIN config.copy_status ccs ON ccs.id = ac.status WHERE ahr.capture_time IS NOT NULL AND ahr.fulfillment_time IS NULL and ahr.cancel_time IS NULL AND ahr.id IN (SELECT id FROM action_hold_request) GROUP BY 2 ORDER By 2

report.name: hold_depth
report.heading: Count.Depth
report.query: SELECT COUNT(ahr.id), ahr.selection_depth FROM action.hold_request ahr WHERE ahr.id IN (SELECT id FROM action_hold_request) AND ahr.cancel_time IS NULL AND ahr.capture_time IS NULL AND ahr.fulfillment_time IS NULL GROUP BY 2 ORDER BY 2

report.name: asset_copy_count
report.heading: Copy Count.Library.Migrated
report.query: SELECT COUNT(ac.id), aou.name, ac.x_migrate::TEXT FROM asset_copy_legacy ac JOIN actor.org_unit aou ON aou.id = ac.circ_lib GROUP BY 2, 3 ORDER BY 2, 3

report.name: asset_deleted_copies
report.heading: Copy Count.Deleted.Migrated
report.query: SELECT COUNT(ac.id), ac.deleted::TEXT, ac.x_migrate::TEXT FROM asset_copy_legacy ac GROUP BY 2, 3

report.name: asset_copies_by_status
report.heading: Copy Count.Status.Migrated
report.query: SELECT COUNT(ac.id), cs.name, ac.x_migrate::TEXT FROM asset_copy_legacy ac JOIN config.copy_status cs ON cs.id = ac.status GROUP BY 2, 3 ORDER BY 2, 3

report.name: asset_precat
report.heading: Copy Count.Migating
report.query: SELECT COUNT(ac.id), ac.x_migrate::TEXT FROM asset_copy_legacy ac WHERE ac.x_bre_id = -1 GROUP BY 2

report.name: asset_circ_mod_copies_count
report.heading: Copy Count.Circulation Modifier.Migrated
report.query: SELECT COUNT(ac.id), ac.circ_modifier, ac.x_migrate::TEXT FROM asset_copy_legacy ac GROUP BY 2, 3 ORDER BY 2, 3

report.name: asset_copy_notes
report.heading: Note Count.Public.Migrated
report.query: SELECT COUNT(acnote.id), acnote.pub::TEXT, acnote.x_migrate::TEXT FROM asset_copy_note_legacy acnote GROUP BY 2, 3 ORDER BY 2, 3

report.name: asset_copy_notes
report.heading: Note Count.Public
report.query: SELECT COUNT(acnote.id), acnote.pub::TEXT FROM asset_copy_note acnote GROUP BY 2 ORDER BY 2

report.name: asset_vols_by_lib
report.heading: Volume Count.Library.Migrated
report.query: SELECT COUNT(acn.id), aou.name, acn.x_migrate::TEXT FROM asset_call_number_legacy acn JOIN actor_org_unit_legacy aou ON aou.id = acn.owning_lib GROUP BY 2, 3 ORDER BY 2, 3

report.name: asset_vols_by_lib
report.heading: Volume Count.Library
report.query: SELECT COUNT(acn.id), aou.name FROM asset_call_number acn JOIN actor.org_unit aou ON aou.id = acn.owning_lib GROUP BY 2 ORDER BY 2

report.name: asset_cops_by_loc_and_org
report.heading: Copy Count.Library.Circ Library.Migrated
report.query: SELECT COUNT(ac.id), acl.name, aou.name, ac.x_migrate::TEXT FROM asset_copy_legacy ac JOIN asset.copy_location acl ON acl.id = ac.location JOIN actor.org_unit aou ON aou.id = ac.circ_lib GROUP BY 2, 3, 4 ORDER BY 2, 3, 4

report.name: asset_barcode_lengths
report.heading: Count of Barcode.Barcode Length.Library
report.query: SELECT COUNT(ac.id), LENGTH(ac.barcode), aou.name FROM asset_copy_legacy ac JOIN actor.org_unit aou ON aou.id = ac.circ_lib WHERE ac.x_migrate = TRUE GROUP BY 2, 3 ORDER BY 3, 2

report.name: asset_barcode_patterns
report.heading: Count of Barcodes (greater than 10).Left 60% of Characters
report.query: SELECT COUNT(ac.id), LEFT(ac.barcode,(ROUND(LENGTH(ac.barcode)*.6))::INT) FROM asset_copy_legacy ac WHERE ac.x_migrate = TRUE GROUP BY 2 HAVING COUNT(ac.id) > 10 ORDER BY 2

report.name: asset_barcode_incumbent_collisions
report.heading: Collision Count
report.query: SELECT COUNT(id) FROM asset_copy_legacy WHERE x_migrate = TRUE AND barcode ~* 'collision' and barcode ~* 'incumbent'
report.note: Incumbent collisions are those where the migrated barcodes collide with existing barcodes in the database.

report.name: asset_barcode_incumbent_collisions
report.heading: Collision Count
report.query: SELECT COUNT(id) FROM asset_copy WHERE barcode ~* 'collision' and barcode ~* 'incumbent'
report.note: Incumbent collisions are those where the migrated barcodes collide with existing barcodes in the database.

report.name: asset_barcode_internal_collisions
report.heading: Collision Count
report.query: SELECT COUNT(id) FROM asset_copy_legacy WHERE x_migrate = TRUE AND barcode ~* 'collision' and barcode ~* 'internal'
report.note: Internal collisions are those where the migrated barcodes have conflicts within their list of barcodes.

report.name: asset_barcode_internal_collisions
report.heading: Collision Count
report.query: SELECT COUNT(id) FROM asset_copy WHERE barcode ~* 'collision' and barcode ~* 'internal'
report.note: Internal collisions are those where the migrated barcodes have conflicts within their list of barcodes.

report.name: asset_barcode_collisions_shortlist
report.heading: Collision List
report.query: SELECT ac.barcode FROM asset_copy_legacy ac WHERE ac.barcode ~* 'collision' ORDER BY 1 LIMIT 20
report.note: This is a shortlist of copy barcode collisions that maxes out at 20. If there are more collisions we will need to run a custom report.

report.name: asset_barcode_collisions_shortlist
report.heading: Collision List
report.query: SELECT ac.barcode FROM asset_copy ac WHERE ac.barcode ~* 'collision' ORDER BY 1 LIMIT 20
report.note: This is a shortlist of patron barcode collisions that maxes out at 20. If there are more collisions we will need to run a custom report.

report.name: asset_barcode_collision_patterns
report.heading: Number of Barcodes Matching Pattern Greater than 10.Left 60% of Characters
report.query: SELECT COUNT(ac.id), LEFT(ac.barcode,(ROUND(LENGTH(ac.barcode)*.6))::INT) FROM asset_copy_legacy ac WHERE barcode ~* 'collision' GROUP BY 2 HAVING COUNT(ac.id) > 10 ORDER BY 2

report.name: asset_barcode_collision_patterns
report.heading: Number of Barcodes Matching Pattern Greater than 10.Left 60% of Characters
report.query: SELECT COUNT(ac.id), LEFT(ac.barcode,(ROUND(LENGTH(ac.barcode)*.6))::INT) FROM asset_copy ac WHERE barcode ~* 'collision' GROUP BY 2 HAVING COUNT(ac.id) > 10 ORDER BY 2

report.name: asset_stat_cats
report.heading: Stat Cat Count.Library.Statistical Category
report.query: SELECT COUNT(ac_sc.id), aou.name, ac_sc.name FROM asset_stat_cat_legacy ac_sc JOIN actor.org_unit aou ON aou.id = ac_sc.owner GROUP BY 2,3 ORDER BY 2,3

report.name: asset_stat_cats
report.heading: Stat Cat Count.Library.Statistical Category
report.query: SELECT COUNT(ac_sc.id), aou.name, ac_sc.name FROM asset_stat_cat ac_sc JOIN actor.org_unit aou ON aou.id = ac_sc.owner GROUP BY 2,3 ORDER BY 2,3

report.name: asset_stat_cat_entries
report.heading: Copy Stat Count.Library.Statistical Category
report.query: SELECT COUNT(map.id), aou.name, ac_sc.name FROM asset_stat_cat_entry_copy_map_legacy map JOIN asset_stat_cat_legacy ac_sc ON ac_sc.id = map.stat_cat JOIN actor.org_unit aou ON aou.id = ac_sc.owner GROUP BY 2,3 ORDER BY 2,3

report.name: asset_stat_cat_entries
report.heading: Copy Stat Count.Library.Statistical Category
report.query: SELECT COUNT(map.id), aou.name, ac_sc.name FROM asset_stat_cat_entry_copy_map map JOIN asset_stat_cat ac_sc ON ac_sc.id = map.stat_cat JOIN actor.org_unit aou ON aou. id = ac_sc.owner GROUP BY 2,3 ORDER BY 2,3

report.name: asset_copy_tags
report.heading: Tag Count.Copy Tag Type.Copy Tag Label.Staff Note.Public
report.query: SELECT COUNT(map.id), tag.tag_type, tag.label, tag.staff_note, tag.pub FROM asset_copy_tag tag JOIN asset_copy_tag_copy_map map ON map.tag = tag.id GROUP BY 2,3,4,5 ORDER BY 2,3

report.name: asset_copy_alerts
report.heading: Alert Count.Alert Type
report.query: SELECT COUNT(*), cat.name FROM asset_copy_alert aca JOIN config.copy_alert_type cat ON cat.id = aca.alert_type GROUP BY 2

report.name: money_billing_voided
report.heading: Count.Voided.Sum.Migrated
report.query: SELECT COUNT(a.id), a.voided::TEXT, SUM(a.amount), a.x_migrate::TEXT FROM money_billing_legacy a GROUP BY 2, 4 ORDER BY 2, 4

report.name: money_billing_voided
report.heading: Count.Voided.Sum
report.query: SELECT COUNT(a.id), a.voided::TEXT, SUM(a.amount) FROM money_billing a GROUP BY 2 ORDER BY 2, 3

report.name: money_billing_by_type
report.heading: Count.Billing Type.Migrated
report.query: SELECT COUNT(a.id), a.billing_type, a.x_migrate::TEXT FROM money_billing_legacy a GROUP BY 2, 3 ORDER BY 2, 3

report.name: money_billing_by_type
report.heading: Count.Billing Type
report.query: SELECT COUNT(a.id), a.billing_type FROM money_billing a GROUP BY 2 ORDER BY 2

report.name: money_cash_payment
report.heading: Count.Voided.Sum.Migrated
report.query: SELECT COUNT(a.id), a.voided::TEXT, SUM(a.amount), a.x_migrate::TEXT FROM money_cash_payment_legacy a GROUP BY 2, 4 ORDER BY 2, 4

report.name: money_cash_payment
report.heading: Count.Voided.Sum
report.query: SELECT COUNT(a.id), a.voided::TEXT, SUM(a.amount) FROM money_cash_payment a GROUP BY 2 ORDER BY 2

report.name: money_check_payment
report.heading: Count.Voided.Sum.Migrated
report.query: SELECT COUNT(a.id), a.voided::TEXT, SUM(a.amount), a.x_migrate::TEXT FROM money_check_payment_legacy a GROUP BY 2, 4 ORDER BY 2, 4

report.name: money_forgive_payment
report.heading: Count.Voided.Sum.Migrated
report.query: SELECT COUNT(a.id), a.voided::TEXT, SUM(a.amount), a.x_migrate::TEXT FROM money_forgive_payment_legacy a GROUP BY 2, 4 ORDER BY 2, 4

report.name: money_forgive_payment
report.heading: Count.Voided.Sum
report.query: SELECT COUNT(a.id), a.voided::TEXT, SUM(a.amount) FROM money_forgive_paymen a GROUP BY 2 ORDER BY 2

report.name: money_goods_payment
report.heading: Count.Voided.Sum.Migrated
report.query: SELECT COUNT(a.id), a.voided::TEXT, SUM(a.amount), a.x_migrate::TEXT FROM money_goods_payment_legacy a GROUP BY 2, 4 ORDER BY 2, 4

report.name: money_work_payment
report.heading: Count.Voided.Sum.Migrated
report.query: SELECT COUNT(a.id), a.voided::TEXT, SUM(a.amount), a.x_migrate::TEXT FROM money_work_payment_legacy a GROUP BY 2, 4 ORDER BY 2, 4

report.name: money_credit_card_payment
report.heading: Count.Voided.Sum.Migrated
report.query: SELECT COUNT(a.id), a.voided::TEXT, SUM(a.amount), a.x_migrate::TEXT FROM money_credit_card_payment_legacy a GROUP BY 2, 4 ORDER BY 2, 4

report.name: money_credit_payment
report.heading: Count.Voided.Sum.Migrated
report.query: SELECT COUNT(a.id), a.voided::TEXT, SUM(a.amount), a.x_migrate::TEXT FROM money_credit_payment_legacy a GROUP BY 2, 4 ORDER BY 2, 4

report.name: bibs_loaded
report.heading: Count
report.query: SELECT COUNT(bre.id) FROM biblio_record_entry_legacy bre WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM biblio.record_entry) ORDER BY 1

report.name: bibs_loaded
report.heading: Count
report.query: SELECT COUNT(bre.id) FROM biblio_record_entry bre WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM biblio.record_entry) ORDER BY 1

report.name: bibswovolumes
report.heading: Count
report.query: SELECT COUNT(id) FROM biblio_record_entry where id NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT record FROM asset_call_number)
report.note: These records would not have been loaded.

report.name: bibswuri
report.heading: Count
report.query: SELECT COUNT(id) FROM biblio_record_entry where id IN (SELECT record FROM asset.call_number WHERE label ~* '##URI##')

report.name: bibs_notes
report.heading: Count.Migrated
report.query: SELECT COUNT(b.id), b.x_migrate::TEXT FROM biblio_record_note_legacy b GROUP BY 2

report.name: bibs_notes
report.heading: Count
report.query: SELECT COUNT(b.id) FROM biblio_record_note b

report.name: bibs_peers
report.heading: Count.Migrated
report.query: SELECT COUNT(b.id), b.x_migrate::TEXT FROM biblio_peer_bib_copy_map_legacy b GROUP BY 2

report.name: bibs_peers
report.heading: Count
report.query: SELECT COUNT(b.id) FROM biblio_peer_bib_copy_map b

report.name: bibs_parts
report.heading: Count.Migrated
report.query: SELECT COUNT(b.id), b.x_migrate::TEXT FROM biblio_monograph_part_legacy b GROUP BY 2

report.name: bibs_parts
report.heading: Count
report.query: SELECT COUNT(b.id) FROM biblio_monograph_part b

report.name: bib_merges
report.heading: Records Merged.Incumbent Records Merged Into
report.query: SELECT SUM(array_length(records,1)), COUNT(*) FROM groups

report.name: bib_merges_searchformat
report.heading: Count.Item Type
report.query: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS temp_unnest; CREATE TABLE temp_unnest AS (SELECT UNNEST(records) FROM groups); SELECT COUNT(record), search_format_str FROM dedupe_batch WHERE record IN (SELECT * FROM temp_unnest) GROUP BY 2 ORDER BY 2

report.name: bibs_not_loaded
report.report_title: Bibliographic Records That Failed to Load
report.heading: Title.Author.Control Number
report.query: SELECT LEFT(ARRAY_TO_STRING(oils_xpath( '//*[@tag="245"]/*[@code="a"]/text()', a.marc),''),50) AS "Title", LEFT(ARRAY_TO_STRING(oils_xpath( '//*[@tag="100"]/*[@code="a"]/text()', a.marc),''),50) AS "Author", ARRAY_TO_STRING(oils_xpath( '//*[@tag="001"]/text()', a.marc),'') AS "001" FROM biblio_record_entry a LEFT JOIN biblio.record_entry b ON b.id = a.id WHERE b.id IS NULL AND a.x_migrate

report.name: usrsbyorg
report.heading: Count.Library.Deleted.Migrated
report.query: SELECT COUNT(au.id), aou.name, au.deleted::TEXT, au.x_migrate::TEXT FROM actor_usr_legacy au JOIN actor.org_unit aou ON aou.id = au.home_ou GROUP BY 2, 3, 4 ORDER BY 2, 3, 4

report.name: usrsbypgt
report.heading: Count.Permission Group.Migrated
report.query: SELECT COUNT(au.id), pgt.name, au.x_migrate::TEXT FROM actor_usr_legacy au JOIN permission.grp_tree pgt ON pgt.id = au.profile GROUP BY 2, 3 ORDER BY 2, 3

report.name: active_usrs
report.heading: Count of Users.Active.Migrated
report.query: SELECT COUNT(id), active::TEXT, x_migrate::TEXT FROM actor_usr_legacy GROUP BY 2, 3

report.name: active_usrs
report.heading: Count of Users.Active
report.query: SELECT COUNT(id), active::TEXT FROM actor_usr GROUP BY 2

report.name: active_usr_barcodes
report.heading: Count of Barcodes.Active.Migrated
report.query: SELECT COUNT(id), active::TEXT, x_migrate::TEXT FROM actor_card_legacy GROUP BY 2, 3

report.name: active_usr_barcodes
report.heading: Count of Barcodes.Active
report.query: SELECT COUNT(id), active::TEXT FROM actor_card GROUP BY 2

report.name: usr_barcode_lengths
report.heading: Count of Barcode.Barcode Length.Library
report.query: SELECT COUNT(acard.id), LENGTH(acard.barcode), aou.name FROM actor_card_legacy acard JOIN actor_usr_legacy au ON au.id = acard.usr JOIN actor.org_unit aou ON aou.id = au.home_ou WHERE acard.x_migrate = TRUE GROUP BY 2, 3 ORDER BY 3, 2

report.name: usr_barcode_lengths
report.heading: Count of Barcode.Barcode Length.Library
report.query: SELECT COUNT(acard.id), LENGTH(acard.barcode), aou.name FROM actor_card acard JOIN actor_usr au ON au.id = acard.usr JOIN actor.org_unit aou ON aou.id = au.home_ou GROUP BY 2, 3 ORDER BY 3, 2

report.name: usr_barcode_patterns
report.heading: Count of Barcodes (greater than 10).Left 60% of Characters
report.query: SELECT COUNT(acard.id), LEFT(acard.barcode,(ROUND(LENGTH(acard.barcode)*.6))::INT) FROM actor_card_legacy acard WHERE acard.x_migrate = TRUE GROUP BY 2 HAVING COUNT(acard.id) > 10 ORDER BY 2

report.name: usr_barcode_patterns
report.heading: Count of Barcodes (greater than 10).Left 60% of Characters
report.query: SELECT COUNT(acard.id), LEFT(acard.barcode,(ROUND(LENGTH(acard.barcode)*.6))::INT) FROM actor_card acard GROUP BY 2 HAVING COUNT(acard.id) > 10 ORDER BY 2

report.name: usr_barcode_collisions
report.heading: Collision Count
report.query: SELECT COUNT(acard.id) FROM actor_card_legacy acard WHERE barcode ~* 'collision' AND x_migrate = TRUE

report.name: usr_barcode_collisions
report.heading: Collision Count
report.query: SELECT COUNT(acard.id) FROM actor_card acard WHERE barcode ~* 'collision'

report.name: usr_barcode_collision_shortlist
report.heading: Collision List
report.query: SELECT acard.barcode FROM actor_card_legacy acard WHERE acard.barcode ~* 'collision' AND acard.x_migrate = TRUE ORDER BY 1 LIMIT 20
report.note: This is a shortlist of patron barcode collisions that maxes out at 20. If there are more collisions we will need to run a custom report. In some cases we may flag individual accounts to not migrate.

report.name: usr_barcode_collision_shortlist
report.heading: Collision List
report.query: SELECT acard.barcode FROM actor_card acard WHERE acard.barcode ~* 'collision' ORDER BY 1 LIMIT 20
report.note: This is a shortlist of patron barcode collisions that maxes out at 20. If there are more collisions we will need to run a custom report. In some cases we may flag individual accounts to not migrate.

reports_file.report: usr_barcode_collision_patterns Common Patron Barcode Collision Patterns a.x_migrate actors 0 Number of Barcodes Matching Pattern Greater than 10.Left 60% of Characters SELECT COUNT(acard.id), LEFT(acard.barcode,(ROUND(LENGTH(acard.barcode)*.6))::INT) FROM actor_card_legacy acard WHERE acard.barcode ~* 'collision' AND acard.x_migrate = TRUE GROUP BY 2 HAVING COUNT(acard.id) > 10 ORDER BY 2

usr_barcode_collision_patterns Common Patron Barcode Collision Patterns a.x_migrate actors 1 Number of Barcodes Matching Pattern Greater than 10.Left 60% of Characters SELECT COUNT(acard.id), LEFT(acard.barcode,(ROUND(LENGTH(acard.barcode)*.6))::INT) FROM actor_card acard WHERE acard.barcode ~* 'collision' GROUP BY 2 HAVING COUNT(acard.id) > 10 ORDER BY 2

report.name: usr_addressses_status
report.heading: Count.Valid.Migrated
report.query: SELECT COUNT(aua.id), valid::TEXT, x_migrate::TEXT FROM actor_usr_address_legacy aua GROUP BY 2, 3

report.name: usr_addressses_status
report.heading: Count.Valid
report.query: SELECT COUNT(aua.id), valid::TEXT FROM actor_usr_address aua GROUP BY 2

report.name: usr_addresses_pending
report.heading: Count of Addresses.Pending.Migrated
report.query: SELECT COUNT(aua.id), pending::TEXT, x_migrate::TEXT FROM actor_usr_address_legacy aua GROUP BY 2, 3

report.name: usr_addresses_pending
report.heading: Count of Addresses.Pending
report.query: SELECT COUNT(aua.id), pending::TEXT FROM actor_usr_address aua GROUP BY 2

report.name: usr_messages
report.heading: Count.Deleted.Migrated
report.query: SELECT COUNT(aum.id), deleted::TEXT, x_migrate::TEXT FROM actor_usr_message_legacy aum GROUP BY 2, 3

report.name: usr_messages
report.heading: Count.Deleted
report.query: SELECT COUNT(aum.id), deleted::TEXT FROM actor_usr_message_legacy aum GROUP BY 2

report.name: usr_notes
report.heading: Count.Public.Migrated
report.query: SELECT COUNT(aun.id), pub::TEXT, x_migrate::TEXT FROM actor_usr_note_legacy aun GROUP BY 2, 3

report.name: usr_notes
report.heading: Count.Public
report.query: SELECT COUNT(aun.id), pub::TEXT FROM actor_usr_note aun GROUP BY 2

report.name: usr_stat_cats
report.heading: Stat Cat Count.Library.Statistical Category.Migrated
report.query: SELECT COUNT(au_sc.id), aou.name, au_sc.name, au_sc.x_migrate::TEXT FROM actor_stat_cat_legacy au_sc JOIN actor.org_unit aou ON aou.id = au_sc.owner GROUP BY 2, 3, 4 ORDER BY 2, 3, 4

report.name: usr_stat_cats
report.heading: Stat Cat Count.Library.Statistical Category
report.query: SELECT COUNT(au_sc.id), aou.name, au_sc.name FROM actor_stat_cat au_sc JOIN actor.org_unit aou ON aou.id = au_sc.owner GROUP BY 2, 3 ORDER BY 2, 3

report.name: usr_stat_cat_entries
report.heading: Patron Stat Count.Library.Statistical Category.Migrated
report.query: SELECT COUNT(map.id), aou.name, au_sc.name, map.x_migrate::TEXT FROM actor_stat_cat_entry_usr_map_legacy map JOIN actor_stat_cat_legacy au_sc ON au_sc.id = map.stat_cat JOIN actor.org_unit aou ON aou.id = au_sc.owner GROUP BY 2, 3, 4 ORDER BY 2,3, 4

report.name: usr_stat_cat_entries
report.heading: Patron Stat Count.Library.Statistical Category
report.query: SELECT COUNT(map.id), aou.name, au_sc.name FROM actor_stat_cat_entry_usr_map map JOIN actor_stat_cat au_sc ON au_sc.id = map.stat_cat JOIN actor.org_unit aou ON aou.id = au_sc.owner GROUP BY 2, 3 ORDER BY 2,3

report.name: usr_thresholds
report.heading: Pateron Group.Org Unit.Penalty.Threshold
report.query: SELECT pgt.name, aou.shortname, sp.name, p.threshold FROM permission_grp_penalty_threshold p JOIN actor.org_unit aou ON aou.id = p.org_unit JOIN permission.grp_tree pgt ON pgt.id = p.grp JOIN config.standing_penalty sp ON sp.id = p.penalty ORDER BY 2, 1, 3

report.name: fund_count
report.heading: Number of Funds.Migrated
report.query: SELECT COUNT(id), x_migrate::TEXT FROM acq_fund_legacy GROUP BY 2;

report.name: fund_count
report.heading: Number of Funds
report.query: SELECT COUNT(id) FROM acq_fund;

report.name: invoice_count
report.heading: Number of Invoices.Migrated
report.query: SELECT COUNT(id), x_migrate::TEXT FROM acq_invoice_legacy GROUP BY 2;

report.name: invoice_count
report.heading: Number of Funds
report.query: SELECT COUNT(id) FROM acq_invoice;

report.name: serials_mfhd_count
report.heading: Number of MFHDs
report.query: SELECT COUNT(id) FROM serial_record_entry

report.name: dedupe_bib_groups
report.heading: Count.Bib Record Groups
report.query: SELECT COUNT(id), 'Total Bibs Being Evaluated' FROM biblio.record_entry WHERE deleted IS FALSE AND id IN (SELECT eg::BIGINT FROM bib_id_map) UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(DISTINCT incoming_bib)), 'Incoming Bibs With Matches Found' FROM bib_matches UNION ALL SELECT (COUNT(bre.id) - (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT incoming_bib) FROM bib_matches)), 'Incoming Bibs With No Match' FROM biblio.record_entry bre WHERE bre.deleted IS FALSE AND bre.id IN (SELECT eg::BIGINT FROM bib_id_map) UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT incoming_bib), 'Incoming Bibs Being Merged into Incumbent' FROM bib_matches WHERE incumbent_bib_score >= incoming_bib_score UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(id), 'Incumbent Bibs With Higher Scores to Incoming' FROM bib_matches WHERE incumbent_bib_score > incoming_bib_score UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(id), 'Incumbent Bibs With Equal Scores to Incoming' FROM bib_matches WHERE incumbent_bib_score = incoming_bib_score UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(id), 'Incumbent Bibs With Lower Scores to Incoming' FROM bib_matches WHERE incumbent_bib_score < incoming_bib_score ;

report.name: dedupe_format_count
report.report_title: Count of Items Matching By Format
report.heading: Count.Format(s)
report.query: SELECT COUNT(id), search_formats FROM bib_matches GROUP BY 2 ORDER BY 2;

report.name: dedupe_score_ranges
report.report_title: Count of Items Matching By Format
report.heading: Lowest Record Score.Largest Record Score.Record Set
report.query: SELECT MIN(incumbent_bib_score), MAX(incumbent_bib_score), 'Incumbent Records' FROM bib_matches UNION ALL SELECT MIN(incoming_bib_score), MAX(incoming_bib_score), 'Incoming Records' FROM bib_matches ;

report.name: dedupe_sample_set
report.report_title: Sample of 20 Matching Dedupe Record Sets
report.heading: Bib Being Merged Into.Bib Being Merged
report.query: SELECT incumbent_bib, incoming_bib FROM bib_matches WHERE incumbent_bib_score >= incoming_bib_score LIMIT 20 ;

report.name: notices_overview
report.heading: ID.Active.Owner.Name.Delay.Validator.Reactor
report.query: SELECT ed.id, ed.active, aou.shortname, LEFT(ed.name,25) || '...', ed.delay, ed.validator, ed.reactor FROM action_trigger.event_definition ed JOIN actor.org_unit aou ON aou.id = ed.owner WHERE ed.owner IN (SELECT DISTINCT home_ou FROM actor_usr) OR ed.owner IN (SELECT DISTINCT parent_ou FROM actor.org_unit WHERE id in (SELECT DISTINCT home_ou FROM actor_usr));

report.name: notices_count
report.report_title: Count of Notices Run with State
report.heading: Count of Notices.State.ID.Owner.Name
report.query: SELECT COUNT(ate.id), ate.state, ed.id, aou.shortname, LEFT(ed.name,25) || '...' FROM action_trigger.event_definition ed JOIN actor.org_unit aou ON aou.id = ed.owner JOIN action_trigger.event ate ON ate.event_def = ed.id WHERE ed.owner IN (SELECT DISTINCT home_ou FROM actor_usr) OR ed.owner IN (SELECT DISTINCT parent_ou FROM actor.org_unit WHERE id in (SELECT DISTINCT home_ou FROM actor_usr)) GROUP BY 2,3,4;
